item.description:
An Afternoon Workshop with Cindy Conner, Founder of Homeplace Earth

Come Learn to feed yourself AND feed the soil from your backyard garden using organic GROW BIOINTENSIVE methods to make your garden productive all year long. Learn about garden planning, cover crops and season extension.

*Get an early start on Spring! 1:00- 4:30 at Cambridge Cohousing, 175 Richdale Ave, Cambridge

*$20 for a full afternoon of intensive learning and tasty nibbles (to sustain you while you're learning)

*Find out more about Homeplace Earth at www.HomeplaceEarth.com

*This Workshop is being organized by member, Steve August. Contact Steve for more information and to reserve your spot. fudgeaugust@hotmail.com

Note: You must email Steve August to register and prepay for this workshop. fudgeaugust@hotmail.com
item.name: Sustainable Vegetable Gardening in Cambridge
